channel.title: London Tech Events by Chuffed Coaching
channel.description: A curated list of interesting tech events in London for developers and entrepreneurs.

item.title: Vibe Coding Meetup
item.description: This meetup is a social coding jam where we use AI to quickly turn fun ideas into functional prototypes. Whether youre an experienced developer or have never written a line of code, youll fit right in.
item.location: The Chapel Market Tavern 58 Penton St, London N1 9PZ

item.title: Tech Startups in the Pub, Oxford Street - Relaxed Networking
item.description: Were levelling up! After 3 years of packed evenings in Shoreditch, were adding a second monthly event, this time midweek in Oxford Street. That means two chances every month to meet founders, techies, and startup people over drinks.
item.location: Simmons Bar Oxford Street 203 Wardour St 路 London

item.title: React Advanced London Meetup: How to Built an Agentic Crew in TypeScript
item.description: Were happy to announce the upcoming React Advanced London Meetup
item.location: The Cooperage, 5 Copper Row 路 Greater London

item.title: Agentic AI and Model Context Protocol (MCP)
item.description: Whether you're a regular, a tech founder, an enthusiast, a budding entrepreneur, or simply curious about the tech scene, you'll fit right in.

item.title: Tech Startups in the Pub
item.description: Whether you're a regular, a tech founder, an enthusiast, a budding entrepreneur, or simply curious about the tech scene, you'll fit right in.
item.location: The Windmill in the City, 27 Tabernacle Street 路 London

item.title: Django London Meetup October
item.description: We will chat, code, hack, connect and make it count! It is an open invitation, you can bring your laptop, or you can come to chat/help/mentor.
item.location: Kraken, 182 Oxford Street, London, W1D 1NN, GB

item.title: Vibe Coding Meetup

item.title: MCP Server Builder Series - London
item.description: Join fellow developers and creators for an interactive event dedicated to Model Context Protocol (MCP) server development.

item.title: JavaScript London in Collaboration with Newday
item.description: We have some fantastic tech talks lined up, there will be plenty of pizzas , and of course drinks , plus plenty of networking with fellow tech enthusiasts.
